predictions.text: University of Michigan 5- to 10-year inflation expectations (preliminary) for November 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.1%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the preliminary November 2025 5- to 10-year inflation expectations series value on the University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers release page. Success if the reported range midpoint falls within 2.8%–3.1%.
monitoring_signals: Consumer inflation news flow and sentiment shifts
predictions.rationale: Long-run expectations have been anchored near 3%. Recent fuel price moderation supports stability within a tight band.

predictions.text: The AAA national average regular gasoline price will print at or below $3.05 per gallon on at least one U.S. reporting date by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check AAA’s Daily Fuel Gauge Report for the national average regular price. Any daily reading ≤ $3.05 by 2025-11-30 counts.
monitoring_signals: NY Harbor RBOB front-month futures settlements
EIA weekly gasoline inventories and implied demand
predictions.rationale: Falling crude and shoulder-season demand point to further pump price declines, but taxes and refining spreads may limit the downside.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or above 4.60% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm any daily close for FRED series DGS10 ≥ 4.60% through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Fed communications and December meeting odds (CME FedWatch)
Risk sentiment and term premium indicators
predictions.rationale: Post-shutdown risk-on unwind and supply concerns can push yields higher near-term, even amid mixed growth data.

predictions.text: The Cboe SKEW Index (SKEW) will close at or above 150.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Cboe historical data for SKEW. Any daily close ≥ 150.0 by 2025-11-30 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Equity drawdowns and demand for crash protection
Macro event risk clustering (data, policy, geopolitics)
Changes in skew of index options
predictions.rationale: Heightened tail-hedging demand during market stress can lift SKEW to elevated readings even if VIX remains moderate.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-10, OFAC will announce at least one new Global Magnitsky (GLOMAG) sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check Treasury press releases for new Global Magnitsky designations dated on or before 2025-12-10.
monitoring_signals: U.S. statements around Human Rights Day (Dec 10)
Congressional or State Dept. human-rights reports
predictions.rationale: Treasury often times GLOMAG actions around Human Rights Day, and rights concerns are elevated globally.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage report will show a net change of -50 Bcf or lower (withdrawal ≥ 50 Bcf) in at least one report published by 2025-12-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify any EIA Weekly Natural Gas Storage release through 2025-12-15 with reported net change ≤ -50 Bcf.
monitoring_signals: Power sector gas burn and LNG feedgas volumes
predictions.rationale: Seasonal heating demand and growing LNG feedgas typically drive larger early-winter withdrawals.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or below €30.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm any official ICE Endex front-month TTF futures settlement ≤ €30.00/MWh by 2025-12-15.
monitoring_signals: EU gas storage fullness and withdrawals
Pipeline flows from Norway and North Africa
predictions.rationale: High storage and steady LNG flows can cap prices absent severe cold or supply disruptions.

predictions.text: CME FedWatch Tool implied probability of a hold (no rate change) at the December 2025 FOMC meeting will close below 20% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-10.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME FedWatch daily close snapshots for the December 2025 meeting. Event occurs if the probability of ‘No Change’ < 20% on any close by 2025-12-10.
predictions.rationale: A dovish pivot or soft data could push markets to price a near-certain cut, reducing hold odds sharply.

predictions.text: TSA daily U.S. checkpoint throughput will reach at least 3,150,000 passengers on at least one day between 2025-11-22 and 2025-12-01 (U.S. reporting dates).
predictions.verification_criteria: Check TSA Passenger Throughput data for the stated window. Any single-day total ≥ 3,150,000 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: Airline scheduled seats and load factors
FAA operational status and ATC delays
predictions.rationale: Thanksgiving often sets annual throughput records; capacity growth and robust travel demand could push a new high.

predictions.text: At least six FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches will occur between 2025-12-01 00:00 UTC and 2025-12-20 23:59 UTC.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count FAA-licensed U.S. orbital launches in the window via FAA AST records and authoritative launch logs. Minimum count: 6.
monitoring_signals: SpaceX manifest cadence and weather ranges
Competitor launch schedules (Rocket Lab, ULA, Blue Origin)
predictions.rationale: Improved reusability and high manifest density typically drive strong December cadence for U.S. launch providers.

predictions.text: At least one U.S. IPO priced between 2025-11-15 and 2025-12-31 will price below the bottom of its marketed range.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify through IPO pricing press releases, Nasdaq/Renaissance Capital data that at least one IPO final price is below the low end of its filed range.
monitoring_signals: Secondary market performance of recent listings
predictions.rationale: Choppy risk sentiment and valuation pressure often force conservative pricing or range cuts into year-end.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub front-month natural gas futures (CME: NG) will settle at or above $3.75 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-12-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm any official CME Henry Hub front-month settlement ≥ $3.75/MMBtu by 2025-12-15.
monitoring_signals: Production, pipeline constraints, and LNG feedgas
predictions.rationale: Seasonal cold snaps and stronger LNG feedgas can lift front-month prices briefly above $3.75.
